text:
Greatly appreciate the nurses here in cck Diverum especially to Shen Ying ( head nurse ) , Baiyuan, Kin , Elizabeth ,Eileen ( pity already left the centre) and Lynn ( administrator) for their compassion, dedication, expertise, abd the positive impact they have on the patients. They are always attentive , calm and communicate clearly and going the extra mile to ensure patient comfort and well being.
Their kindness made a real difference and truly a great advocate to the patients.
Although there is certain nurse that is crude and lack of awareness of noise level, E.g closing toilet door loudly
